value:
$nMPID_リアーネ|Excitement is in the air...I feel it.
The festival...brings such joy.
I wish to go out...and sing!

$nMPID_双界アクア|Leanne's singing is so mysterious.
It's pure and clear...like the clearest
water in a still pond.

$nMPID_リアーネ|Azura's voice...makes me very happy.
It is...so pretty. I wish to hear it...
forever and ever!

$nMPID_双界アクア|Everyone seems to be in high spirits.
Both the fighters and spectators are
enjoying the festival in their own way.

$nMPID_リアーネ|Tibarn told my brother...not to fight.
The festival tournament...is too
dangerous. Tibarn said.

$nMPID_リアーネ|You are invited...to join a Hatari
festival. Come enjoy it. At
$Nf's castle.

$nMPID_双界アクア|Let us harmonize, Leanne, so our
song can bestow courage on all
the brave fighters of this festival!

$nMPID_リアーネ|We must...continue! The festival is...
just getting started!

$nMPID_双界アクア|There's no need to strain yourself,
Leanne. Let's find something fun
to do while our voices recover!

$nMPID_リアーネ|Thank you. This will help us...to sing
even more! Everyone...at the festival...
will enjoy our song.

I am Azura, and this is Leanne of
the Heron Clan. Listen now as we
raise our voices to this valiant festival.

$nMPID_双界アクア|That was quite an experience, wasn't
it, Leanne? How did you enjoy the
Hatari festival?$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|Everyone was...so brave!
Such passion...strength...skill.$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|A real battle can end only in tragedy,
but this festival celebrates the beauty
of combat without the sorrow.$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|Why is there not...always a festival?
Beauty instead...of pain. Seems like
something...to strive for.$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|If we did, combat would be a part of
daily life. Better to admire it from afar
than to always live in its shadow.$k$p$nMPID_リアーネ|You are...right. I shall sing...to make
beauty and...celebrate peace until
the festival returns!
やっ
無駄よ
きゃあああっ
まだやれる…！
I won't...lose!
$nMPID_二人|The finale!
$nMPID_二人|Together... We sing!
$nMPID_双界アクア|Out of our way!
$nMPID_リアーネ|Stay back!
I can sing no more...
You can do it!
I will help!
Let our voices ring out! Listen to our song!
I like your song! Heehee! Thank you, Leanne.
*Sigh*
You have a beautiful voice. Thank you...
I...do not know.
Looks like it's my turn.
So fun!
$nMPID_双界アクア|Are you ready?
$nMPID_リアーネ|Yes... I am ready.

$nMPID_双界アクア|I think this festival's a little on the
boisterous side! Why did we get
summoned here, of all places?

I can handle myself, but I worry
about you, Leanne.
$nMPID_リアーネ|No, I... I like Hatari.

Hatari has a strong queen...and now
my brother is here too.

$nMPID_双界アクア|That's right! Your brother and Queen
Nailah are a couple, aren't they?

Well! That being the case, this is your
brother's festival too, I suppose!

$nMPID_リアーネ|Hahaha. What are your brothers and
sisters like? Do you get along?

$nMPID_双界アクア|What are they like? That's a difficult
question... I have a lot of them,
after all. It's...complicated.

$nMPID_リアーネ|Complicated? You mean...difficult?
Your family?

$nMPID_双界アクア|It can be, yes. But they're all precious
to me. Every one...

$nMPID_リアーネ|If that is...your feeling, then... You are
true family...

$nMPID_双界アクア|You're right, Leanne. I cherish them
all as family.
$nMPID_リアーネ|Let's sing! Bring joy to all!

$nMPID_双界アクア|Yes, let us sing. Let us sing so that
all of my brothers and sisters can
hear us!

We will sing a gentle song that will
bring their hearts just a little bit
closer together...
